_header: Our gladness of heart is I-went
_description: A translation of Lamentations 5:15-16 — two couplets

WorcF126.Transcription:
Oure gladnesse of herte ys Awent To sorwe & wo our murþe is
                    wentþe garland of blisse is fallen ous froAlas for oure senes we
                    han þis wo
WorcF126.Note: Written as prose; in a Latin prose sermon
